mapper.select: select course.course_id, course_name, coach_name,course_time,course_count,course_already,course_date from course, coach, coach_course where course.course_id = coach_course.id_course and coach_course.id_coach = coach.coach_id

select course.course_id, course_name, coach.coach_id, coach_name from course, coach_course, coach where course.course_id = coach_course.id_course and coach_course.id_coach = coach.coach_id and (coach.coach_id LIKE ('%', #{coachKey}, '%') or coach_name LIKE ('%', #{coachKey}, '%'))

select course.course_id, course_name, coach.id, coach_name from course, coach_course, coach where course.course_id = coach_course.id_course and coach_course.id_coach = coach.coach_id and (course.course_id LIKE ('%', #{courseKey}, '%') or course_name LIKE ('%', #{courseKey}, '%'))
